description: Scammer poses as crypto trading expert offering guaranteed returns. Requests investment via UPI/bank transfer with promises of high profits.

turns.scammer_message: Hello! I'm Vikram from CryptoWealth India. We help people earn 300-500% returns in Bitcoin trading. Minimum investment Rs.10,000. Are you interested in financial freedom? ðŸ'°

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: namaste vikram beta... i am retired school teacher and dont understand these modern things... what is bitcoin?? is it like bank fixed deposit?? pls explain slowly i am not good with phone...

turns.scammer_message: Great! We have expert traders who make profits daily using AI algorithms. Your Rs.10,000 can become Rs.40,000 in just 30 days! We already have 5000+ successful investors. WhatsApp me at +91-9876543210 for portfolio proof.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta 40000 rupees is very big amount for me... it will help with my medicines... i am not good at whatsapp finding sometimes it hangs... can i just send the 10000 from my phone pay app?? where do i send it beta pls guide me

turns.scammer_message: Yes mam/sir all profits are guaranteed and tax-free! Just transfer Rs.10,000 to start. Pay to our company UPI: cryptowealth.invest@paytm or to our director's account for faster activation.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i entered teh upi id you gave... but my phone is asking to verify name of person... i am scared to send money to wrong place... what name should show up when i pay?? pls tell me exactly so i can click pay...

turns.scammer_message: Perfect! Bank details: A/C Number 98765432109876, IFSC SBIN0012345, Name: CryptoWealth Trading Pvt Ltd. After payment, create account on our platform: http://cryptowealth-india.trade

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i wrote down account number... name crypto wealth trading pvt ltd right?? but i am very scared of this link you sent... my son told me never click blue links on phone it steals money... is it necessary to click?? can i just send money to bank account directly??

turns.scammer_message: Once payment done, email screenshot to support@cryptowealth.trade and call our trading desk at 8899001122 for instant account activation. Limited slots available today only! Don't miss this opportunity!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i wrote down number 8899001122... i will call if transfer fails... oh god my son rohan just came home early... he is ringing the bell... i have to cut call now or he will see me chatting... he gets very angry... i will do this later sorry beta bye
